snippet: An independent Cuban journalist writes about how efforts to bring the United States and Cuba closer together have paid off.
lead_paragraph: An independent Cuban journalist writes about how efforts to bring the United States and Cuba closer together have paid off.

headline.seo: The Cuban Journalist Miriam Leiva Writes About Relations With the U.S.
headline.main: From Havana, a Prominent Voice for Change
headline.print_headline: From Havana, a Prominent Voice for Change
